definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment
definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: It is possible to trim off any blank area after printing.
sentences.chinese: 地图印刷完毕后，可将空白部分裁切掉。

sentences.english: Playbill output file, so long as plan dinking die outer edge line then.
sentences.chinese: 海报输出档案，只要绘制裁切外框线即可。

sentences.english: May depend on customer demand dinking die each kind of specification.
sentences.chinese: 可依客户需求裁切各种规格。

sentences.english: The part of the image that will be retained during the crop.
sentences.chinese: 将会在裁切后保留图片的一部分。

sentences.english: Plane blade cutting, manual cutting feed, and with smooth end surface.
sentences.chinese: 平刀裁切，手动进刀，端面平整。

sentences.english: Page curatiue Zhang, paper cutting machine with a single side of a page will be trimmed to the desired size.
sentences.chinese: 页张理齐后，用单面切纸机把书页裁切成所需的大小。

sentences.english: Maintains the height-to-width ratio of the bounding box used to crop the image.
sentences.chinese: 可维持用来裁切图片的范围框的高度与宽度的比例。

sentences.english: Boring and sizing paper laminated chipboard and MDF panels.
sentences.chinese: 用于贴面刨花板和中密度板的钻孔和裁切。

sentences.english: The splits or striped patterns may reduce the diaphragm dinking die size which increases the production cost.
sentences.chinese: 斑点会造成膜片裁切尺寸变小，而增加制造成本。

sentences.english: This option is enabled only when you choose to crop the image.
sentences.chinese: 此选项只有当您选择裁切图片时启用。

sentences.english: We add element use die-cut make the booklet more interesting.
sentences.chinese: 并且我们加入了局部裁切来令宣传册更加有趣。

sentences.english: Do not peel off protective films when cutting.
sentences.chinese: 裁切时勿将保护膜撕开。

sentences.english: With all the papers aligned against their left-hand edge, place them on your cutting mat.
sentences.chinese: 裁好的纸靠左边缘对齐，挡在裁切垫上。

sentences.english: To apply gold or other metallic leaf to the trim edges of a book.
sentences.chinese: 中义在书的裁切边缘覆盖上一层黄金或金属箔。

definition: color printing using several overlaid images
to edge-join boards with glue to form a panel (woodworking)
